short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DMarket Trust Shield Chrome Extension THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your trading experience on DMarket to the next level with the DMarket TrustShield, a tool designed to provide a secure and seamless trading environment for skins and in-game items.

Key Features:

	•	Authenticity Verification: Ensures your trading partner is an official DMarket bot, enhancing trust in transactions on Steam.
	•	Phishing Website Blocker: Actively identifies and alerts phishing websites mimicking DMarket, keeping your account and data safe.

Data Privacy:

The DMarket Chrome Extension does not collect any personal user data. We are committed to ensuring that your data remains private and secure.

Transparency:

This extension is Open Source, meaning anyone can view, verify, and contribute to the code, ensuring compliance with the highest standards of security and privacy.
GitHub Repository: https://github.com/dmarket/chrome-extension

Socials:
	•	Discord: https://discord.gg/dmarket
	•	Twitter: https://twitter.com/Dmarket
	•	Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Dmarket
